thread.section_title: Hotel Diocleziano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: profecto
title: Excellent
text: This hotel met my three basic requirements - clean, quiet, and a comfortable bed. With the bed you get pillow choices, and my mattress was too firm for my liking so they put on a nice topper which made it perfect. The hotel is conveniently located to everything, staff are helpful and friendly, and the breakfast is good with plenty of choice. I had just one problem, the room was overheated - a strange problem to have in early March - so I had to keep the window open during the day and take the blanket off during the night. Definitely recommend this hotel.
